bioghist.p: Ethel C. Bartholomew was an actress and daughter of William H. Bartholomew (b. 1832) and Sallie Apt (d. 1934), who were also actors. W. H. Bartholomew initially appeared under the stage name W. H. Allen (until 1856 or 1858).

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of scrapbooks on the acting careers of Sallie Apt Bartholomew, W. H. Bartholomew, and Ethel C. Bartholomew. The scrapbooks include newspaper announcements and reviews of plays, cabinet photographs, and playbills. The collection also includes clippings on events at the Edwin Forrest Home during W. H. Bartholomew's residence there, articles about famous actors and theatrical news.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
